name: Reject Operation
description: Rejects the dispense of the medication. After the rejection of the e-prescription the prescription server has to delete the value stored in Task.identifier:Secret and to change the status in Task.status into 'ready'. Then the e-prescription can be retrieved from another pharmacy or it can be deleted by the patient.

parameter.name: secret
parameter.documentation: The Operation gets as input the secret Parameter inside of the URL. This paramter must be equal to the value stored in Task.identifier:Secret. Otherwise the Operation aborts with an error.
